mapper.select: /* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyInfo [Emergency.xml] */ select tp.saf_train_plan_no -- 훈련계획번호 ,tp.dept_cd --주관부서코드 ,dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(tp.dept_cd) as dept_nm ,tp.train_type_cd -- 훈련구분코드 SAF_TRA_COURSE_CLS ,dbo.GET_CODE_NM(tp.train_type_cd, 'SAF_TRA_COURSE_CLS') as train_type_nm ,tp.train_user_id -- 훈련교관ID ,dbo.GET_USER_NM(tp.train_user_id) as train_user_nm ,tp.train_dept_cd -- 훈련교관소속부서코드 ,dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(tp.train_dept_cd) as train_dept_nm ,tp.train_nm -- 훈련명 ,tp.train_start_ymd -- 훈련시작일 ,tp.train_end_ymd -- 훈련종료일 ,tp.train_s_time -- 훈련시작시간 ,tp.train_e_time -- 훈련종료시간 ,tp.train_s_hour -- 훈련시작시 ,tp.train_s_min -- 훈련시작분 ,tp.train_e_hour -- 훈련종료시 ,tp.train_e_min -- 훈련종료분 ,tp.train_place -- 훈련장소 ,tp.train_content -- 훈련내용요약 ,tp.chng_num ,tp.create_user_id -- 등록자 ,dbo.GET_USER_NM(tp.create_user_id) as create_user_nm ,convert(char(10), tp.create_dt, 23) as create_dt -- 등록일 ,tp.update_user_id -- 수정자 ,tp.update_dt -- 수정일 ,tp.train_method_cd -- 훈련방법코드 ,dbo.GET_CODE_NM_LANG(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'TRAIN_METHOD_CD', tp.train_method_cd) as train_method_nm ,tp.train_plan_state -- 훈련계획단계 ,tp.ori_saf_train_plan_no -- 원훈련계획번호 ,( select train_nm from saf_train_plan where saf_train_plan_no = tp.ori_saf_train_plan_no ) as ori_train_nm -- 원훈련명 ,rtp.saf_train_plan_no as re_saf_train_plan_no -- 재훈련계획번호 ,rtp.train_nm as re_train_nm -- 재훈련명 ,rtp.train_plan_state as re_train_plan_state --재훈련계획단계 ,tp.re_train_yn -- 재훈련여부 from saf_train_plan tp LEFT OUTER JOIN saf_train_plan rtp on tp.saf_train_plan_no = rtp.ori_saf_train_plan_no where tp.saf_train_plan_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}

/* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyDeptLists [Emergency.xml] */ select td.dept_cd ,dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(td.dept_cd) as dept_nm ,td.saf_train_plan_no ,td.saf_train_dept_rslt_no ,td.train_desc ,td.train_yn ,td.train_user_cnt ,td.train_ymd ,case when td.state_cd = 'PSEND' then '완료' else '미완료' end as trainCompleteYn ,td.state_cd ,td.proc_step_cd ,td.train_s_time ,td.train_e_time ,td.train_impr_desc ,td.train_eval_opin ,convert(varchar(10), td.train_complete_dt, 23) as train_complete_dt ,td.create_user_id ,td.create_dt from saf_train_dept_rslt td where td.saf_train_plan_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}

/* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyScenarioLists [Emergency.xml] */ select stms.saf_train_mst_no ,stms.train_sce_no ,sts.title from saf_train_mst_sce stms inner join saf_train_sce sts on sts.train_sce_no = stms.train_sce_no where stms.saf_train_mst_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}

/* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyResultInfo [Emergency.xml] */ select tp.saf_train_plan_no -- 훈련계획번호 ,tp.dept_cd --주관부서코드 ,dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(tp.dept_cd) as dept_nm ,tp.train_type_cd -- 훈련구분코드 SAF_TRA_COURSE_CLS ,dbo.GET_CODE_NM(tp.train_type_cd, 'SAF_TRA_COURSE_CLS') as train_type_nm ,tp.train_user_id -- 훈련교관ID ,dbo.GET_USER_NM(tp.train_user_id) as train_user_nm ,tp.train_dept_cd -- 훈련교관소속부서코드 ,dbo.GET_DEPT_NM(tp.train_dept_cd) as train_dept_nm ,tp.train_nm -- 훈련명 ,tp.train_start_ymd -- 훈련시작일 ,tp.train_end_ymd -- 훈련종료일 ,tp.train_s_time -- 훈련시작시간 ,tp.train_e_time -- 훈련종료시간 ,tp.train_s_hour -- 훈련시작시 ,tp.train_s_min -- 훈련시작분 ,tp.train_e_hour -- 훈련종료시 ,tp.train_e_min -- 훈련종료분 ,tp.train_place -- 훈련장소 ,tp.train_content -- 훈련내용요약 ,tp.chng_num ,tp.create_user_id -- 등록자 ,dbo.GET_USER_NM(tp.create_user_id) as create_user_nm ,convert(char(10), tp.create_dt, 23) as create_dt -- 등록일 ,tp.update_user_id -- 수정자 ,tp.update_dt -- 수정일 ,tp.train_method_cd -- 훈련방법코드 ,dbo.GET_CODE_NM_LANG(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'TRAIN_METHOD_CD', tp.train_method_cd) as train_method_nm ,tp.train_plan_state -- 훈련계획단계 ,tp.ori_saf_train_plan_no -- 원훈련계획번호 ,( select train_nm from saf_train_plan where saf_train_plan_no = tp.ori_saf_train_plan_no ) as ori_train_nm -- 원훈련명 ,rtp.saf_train_plan_no as re_saf_train_plan_no -- 재훈련계획번호 ,rtp.train_nm as re_train_nm -- 재훈련명 ,rtp.train_plan_state as re_train_plan_state --재훈련계획단계 ,tp.re_train_yn -- 재훈련여부 ,tr.train_ymd -- 훈련일 ,tr.train_s_time as sub_train_s_time -- 훈련결과-훈련시작시간 ,tr.train_e_time as sub_train_e_time -- 훈련결과-훈련종료시간 ,tr.train_desc -- 비고 ,isnull(tr.train_yn, 'N') as train_yn -- 참여인원수 ,isnull(tr.train_user_cnt, 0) as train_user_cnt -- 참여여부 from saf_train_plan tp LEFT OUTER JOIN saf_train_plan rtp on tp.saf_train_plan_no = rtp.ori_saf_train_plan_no LEFT OUTER JOIN saf_train_rslt tr on tp.saf_train_plan_no = tr.saf_train_plan_no where tp.saf_train_plan_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}

/* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyVideo [Emergency.xml] */ select saf_train_plan_no ,video_url ,video_total_time ,video_comp_time ,use_yn ,create_user_id ,create_dt ,update_user_id ,update_dt FROM saf_train_plan_video where 1=1 and saf_train_plan_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}

/* EmergencyMapper.getEmergencyOutSideUsers [Emergency.xml] */ select tdsp.subconn_psn_no ,tdsp.saf_train_plan_no ,cvm.vendor_nm ,tdsp.vendor_cd ,tdsp.worker_nm ,tdsp.birth_ymd ,tdsp.gender_cd ,m.code_nm as gender_nm ,tdsp.vendor_worker_no ,tdsp.complet_ymd ,tdsp.remark from saf_train_dtl_subconn_psn tdsp left outer join com_vendor_mst cvm on tdsp.vendor_cd = cvm.vendor_cd left outer join dbo.LANG_CODE_MASTER(#{defaultParam.lang}, 'COM_SEX_TYPE') m on m.code = tdsp.gender_cd where tdsp.saf_train_plan_no = #{safTrainPlanNo}
